reviews.review_msg: Who chooses who knows, this lesson is so simple it has to be complicated.
Very interesting course. Found many new and interesting information.

HSCI 160 had interesting concepts and useful information, however, the professor made it unbearable. They had lectures with minimal information, explained over a 3-hour lecture & gave vague grading comments. They were rude and condescending to students.  I do not recommend taking this course with this professor.

She is extremely rude and not understanding when you try to talk to her, does not matter if you have made an honest mistake or error with your work. She has no empathy and does not care about her students one bit. Save yourself the stress and do not take a class with her!!!!

She is a friendly professor but terrible at explaining concepts in class. Getting a hold of her outside of the class is challenging because she is never available, so you must email your TA and ask for help. Also, how she designs her assignments and quizzes makes no sense, even though the concept is straightforward. I do not recommend it.
she's a very tough grader. Miss a class and that's it lol.
